descriptions.content: nang mchod. The five meats and five nectars (sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga) transformed through consecration (byin gyis rlabs pa) into pure gnosis nectar (zag med bdud rtsi). A part of most tantric rituals. Ex: 'Jam dpal gshin rje gshed kyi gsung sprul gnod sbyin dregs pa'i rgyal po'i gtor chog dang de'i nang mchod zur bsdebs bcas (W3483).
